Message.Title: Here's how it works dummiez:
Message.Msg: Supply of stock iz dropping faster than demand. When supply goes down az demand risez pricez go UP (ref. ecomomics 101) What iz making supply go down? 1. Supply: Controlled Float limits - 'banks' bought up the bulk of annointed low share count stox at or near the bottom of late '08-early '10 on implicit and explicit garuanteez from the fed that they will be capitalized (ie bailed out) in order to be able to buy, hold and add 'for an extended period of time'. no one benefiting from the scam darez split a bitcoin stok to make more bitcoin, because even though demand iz low (ie low volumez - the name of the game iz to keep supply lower in certain annointed stocks) 2. Demand : demand on 'autopilot'. While demand amongst mainstreet iz low, demand on wall street remainz on autopilot by way of auto purchasez through fundz held in 401k'z, etfs, and pension fundz. Supply haz and will continue to be restricted below demand az long az no forced selling lasts by way of end qe and event that causez forced selling due to general panick by sheeple In these 'auto demand' fundz. And sybs favorite railing on what keeps Demand above supply: short covering action of shorts shooting each other az they fight to see who can unwillingly cover at the highest price. And a kicker for the banks troublez of buying holding and adding bitcoin stox using opms: crack head optionz buyerz which pay a nice kicker to the 'banks' in the form of weekly, monthly, quarterly, and yearly optionz premiumz... Its really a basic yet dirty game, but it aint gonna change before q1 2014 at the earliest, and it pricez will continue to rise exponentially az long az shorts keep piling in while sheeple become even more complacent and feel the need to 'get in' which alwayz happenz at the top of a major mkt shift.

Message.Title: Pay attn ex.... Sybs knowz trading and dealmaking haz done so 'for an extended period of time ' in all formz of markets
Message.Msg: Tech, while forthright, well written, and honest about hiz convictionz has been and iz a pied piper for shorts leading them to death and destruction. He'z about to lose EVERYTHING in both bitcoin stok markets and private business withon hiz domestic energy play in a glutted energy supply market. 1. He either doesnt understand or iz sticking hiz head in the sand on basic supply & demand principalz of all formz of hiz 'investments' 2. He holdz hiz convictionz at all costs to hiz own detriment - he may be found correct one day in the future, but hiz solvancy haz and will evaporate long before that day. Wether tech understandz this or not - sybil knowz both markets and the energy industry very well. Tech way under estimates the shift mechanics and dynamics of both and unfortunately iz about to become a casualty of hiz convictionz. Most like tech, but that wont save him from himself.

Topic.Title: PE N/A is it means PO Nothing to be Afraid ?

Message.Msg: This iz wrong speak. Fundiez have not and do not matter in the mechanics of the current markets. They will one day, but that hold to 'sane' thinking will make you insolvent long before insanemarket collapse. Even if this mode of thought iz almost 'timed' correctly, it matterz not if you go insolvent / calitulate even 1 millisecond before you are found correct. That one millisecond before you capitulate will be filled with blinding pain and heartbreak, and the closer you are short of timing the markets insanity correctly, the more likely you are to be found shortly afterward hanging from a rope after you did yourself in az it becomez clear that you were found to be correct after you lost everything.

Topic.Title: Pay attn ex.... Sybs knowz trading and dealmaking haz done so 'for an extended period of time ' in all formz of markets

Message.Msg: Sybs: I am most interested in your supply statements on energy. PLEASE elucidate on the massive supply coming online. What form of energy is it (NG, coventional crude, tight oil, shale, tar sands, etc)? What are the unit economics (high or low fixed cost, marginal cost of production measured in both $ and units of energy input). Have you asked yourself why WTI costs are as high as they've ever been in Sept despite massive drops in domestic transportation consumption? Why it is that demand destruction is what is limiting energy price jincreases? Seriously, I'd love to see you try to have an intellectual debate rather than BS mechanics and fearmongering. Eductae me stud...

Topic.Title: Pay attn ex.... Sybs knowz trading and dealmaking haz done so 'for an extended period of time ' in all formz of markets

Message.Msg: A thoughtful answer from someone who truly knows energy well requires an analysis of the economics of each source of supply in the aggregate supply curve. Bonus points will be given to those that understand commodity cost curves and how they determine ST and LT pricing, along with who truly captures value... Feel free to pivot from there to explain geographical differences in electricity pricing as well. For example, why are prices in Caribbean island from $.20-$.65 / kWh while Illinois is between $.05-$.07? I would love to see some real rigor here... I'm intellectually curious and honest so I would love to be proven wrong. So, please bring it.

Topic.Title: Pay attn ex.... Sybs knowz trading and dealmaking haz done so 'for an extended period of time ' in all formz of markets

Message.Msg: I hope your analysis will include status of supergiant oil fields (including location and productions trends/cost) and the correlation between that and available net exports. Oh, and most recent data on ddeplation rates in the Bakken...

Topic.Title: The true looming fight...

Message.Msg: Cash, I read non stop and am always testing my mental model on what is REALLY happening in the economy against the fundamental, unadjusted results. Akin to Dalio's model, but truly pushed down to the level of the individual since the macroeconomy, despite the Fed central planning politburo is really the emergent behavior of individual microeconomic decisions. Content oriented posts force me to synthesize informtation as it comes available to build/refine my understanding. I'm not playing to make money in this scam market. I'm playing to secure positions/assets that will GENERATE real economic value after the charade falls apart. In other words, truly productive assets for a post-adjustment/rebalancing world. Geeg, NAS and the rest of these chumps will find they spent decades honing a skill that creates no value and that they have no understanding of what is really going on. Financial assets will collapse in value and they'll struggle to be able to generate the ongoing flow of value as the financial markets normalize to sustainable shares of the economy.

Wti will be trading 30-35 in 2015 and will never rize above 150 .....

Topic.Title: Pay attn ex.... Sybs knowz trading and dealmaking haz done so 'for an extended period of time ' in all formz of markets

Message.Msg: Sybs: I'm disappointed. Surely you understand the different supply/demand dynamics for various forms of energy. Sure, at $500 a barrel, there is more than enough energy. Talkng about technically recoverable resources means little. How much are folks making on all that natty gas? What about oil? How about the Saudi's? The economics of production are very different... By the way, my startups leverages the glut from natty gas fracking and stranded gas (say T&T). That glut makes my process more economically compelling. Same with the distributed generation technology. That's why understanding the fundamental economics (and energy balance) is important. The gluts you are referring to help me...
